query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS evidence_items (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  evidenceSetId INT NOT NULL,
  itemType ENUM('doc_chunk', 'dataset_row', 'indicator_point', 'event_record', 'regulation', 'excerpt') NOT NULL,
  itemId INT,
  sourceOrg VARCHAR(255),
  sourceDate DATE,
  retrievedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  provenanceJson JSON,
  confidenceGrade ENUM('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') DEFAULT 'C',
  textContent TEXT,
  pageRef VARCHAR(100),
  documentUrl TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_evidence_set (evidenceSetId),
  INDEX idx_item_type (itemType)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4DB9hJWqLzCzJpD.4ae2ba9639dc --database XodoyKMzPdFiKkVj3QFTGK --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS evidence_items (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  evidenceSetId INT NOT NULL,
  itemType ENUM('doc_chunk', 'dataset_row', 'indicator_point', 'event_record', 'regulation', 'excerpt') NOT NULL,
  itemId INT,
  sourceOrg VARCHAR(255),
  sourceDate DATE,
  retrievedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  provenanceJson JSON,
  confidenceGrade ENUM('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') DEFAULT 'C',
  textContent TEXT,
  pageRef VARCHAR(100),
  documentUrl TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_evidence_set (evidenceSetId),
  INDEX idx_item_type (itemType)
);
